src:
Malam Buruk Barcelona: Hanya Imbang dan Dicemooh Fans Sendiri
06 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona hanya bisa bermain imbang 0-0 ketika menjamu Slavia Praha pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Hasil ini jelas tak memuaskan mengingat hasrat Barca meraih trofi bergengsi tersebut musim ini.
Mengutip Marca, saat ini Blaugrana tampak seperti tim tanpa jiwa, hanya hanya berharap keajaiban Lionel Messi bisa menyelamatkan mereka. Sayangnya, sehebat apa pun Messi, dia tidak bisa melakukan segalanya seorang diri.
Barca sudah mendatangkan Antoine Griezmann musim ini, juga Ousmane Dembele beberapa tahun lalu dengan harga selangit. Nahas, dua pemain ini tidak bisa mengimbangi Messi.
Skuad Barca dicemooh fans mereka sendiri menjelang akhir pertandingan ini. Tentu, Ernesto Valverde menghadapi tekanan yang kian besar.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Barcelona's Bad Night: Just Draw and Be Scorned by Your Own Fans
Nov 6 2019, 5:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona can only play 0-0 when entertaining Slavia Prague on Matchday 4 Group F Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. This result is clearly unsatisfactory considering Barca's desire to win the prestigious trophy this season.
Quoting Marca, at the moment the Blaugrana look like a soulless team, only hoping that Lionel Messi's miracle can save them. Unfortunately, no matter how great Messi is, he can't do everything alone.
Barca have brought Antoine Griezmann this season, also Ousmane Dembele a few years ago at exorbitant prices. Nahas, these two players could not compensate for Messi.
Barca's squad was scorned by their own fans towards the end of this match. Of course, Ernesto Valverde faced growing pressures.

Read below, Bolaneters!
